faq_bot.externals.register_bot.register_bot()¶

Register a message bot.

reference - Common Message Property

Parameters

photo_address – Access address of user’s Avatar, If you need to change the user image, please replace the corresponding file in the image/, Only PNG file.

reference - Common Message Property

Parameters

bot_no – bot no

faq_bot.externals.register_bot.init_bot()¶

Initialize bot info. If the BOT is not registered, the system will fail to start.

Before BOT registration, If BOT has been registered, it does not need to be re registered.

reference - Common Message Property

faq_bot
